Barrage of Technology.Elite 1: Battle skill Brr-Brr-Bomb β improved: After applying Solidification, the next basic attack performed becomes a Final Strike.
Barrage of Technology.Elite 2: Battle skill Brr-Brr-Bomb β improved: After applying Solidification, the next basic attack directly becomes a Final Strike with DMG Dealt +50%.

Freezing Point.Elite 2: Against enemies with active Cryo Infliction, gains Critical DMG Dealt +10%. Effect is doubled against enemies with Solidification.
Freezing Point.Elite 3: Against enemies with active Cryo Infliction, gains Critical DMG Dealt +20%. Effect is doubled against enemies with Solidification.

Fungal Pigment Extraction.Elite 1: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant fungal matter growth rate +20%
Fungal Pigment Extraction.Elite 3: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant fungal matter growth rate +30%

Fashionista.Elite 2: Assign to Growth Chamber to slow Mood Drop of all operators in it by 14%
Fashionista.Elite 4: Assign to Growth Chamber to slow Mood Drop of all operators in it by 18%
